itunes:subtitle: Brian Stelter has been fired by CNN and appears to have few prospects moving forward, breaking down a list of rich celebrities who took PPP loans during COVID including Jared Kushner and Reese Witherspoon, the Saudis threw a woman in jail for mean tweets...
itunes:summary:
Brian Stelter has been fired by CNN and appears to have few prospects moving forward, breaking down a list of rich celebrities who took PPP loans during COVID including Jared Kushner and Reese Witherspoon, the Saudis threw a woman in jail for mean tweets (about Saudi Arabia), Minneapolis has said the next time they have school layoffs they're going to fire white teachers first, and Finland's Prime Minister loves to rage.
